        Description copied from interface: IScopedEntityBizFacade
        Searches for the Extension Trigger default values for the UI, including the scope-pair values (level and name) corresponding to the user's login scope or the closest accessible scope.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        inUserContext - user's context
        inOutMessageCollector - message collector
        inScopeLevel - scoped object's scopeLevel metafield Id
        inScopeGkey - scoped object's scopeGkey metafield Id
        Returns:
        a set of default values for triggers.

      • getScopeChildrenLovKeysQuery

        @Nullable
public DomainQuery getScopeChildrenLovKeysQuery(UserContext inUserContext,
                                                           MessageCollector inOutMessageCollector,
                                                           int inScopeLevel)
        Description copied from interface: IScopedEntityBizFacade
        Creates a LOV query for the scope level desired that will return the objects the user can perform CRUD operations that level. Node set result is based on user's broadest scope allowed, NOT on the user's log in scope. The query has the scoping disabled, so no further scoping is applied.
        Specified by:
        getScopeChildrenLovKeysQuery in interface IScopedEntityBizFacade
        Parameters:
        inUserContext - user's context
        inOutMessageCollector - message collector
        inScopeLevel - scope level for which LOV keys are desired
        Returns:
        query
